thread.title: Xavier ends half with a ‘face bucket’ and 3⁄4 court heave vs Gonzaga. Only one counted
thread.title_full: Xavier ends half with a ‘face bucket’ and 3⁄4 court heave vs Gonzaga. Only one counted

author: Ricky O'Donnell
title: Xavier ends half with a ‘face bucket’ and 3⁄4 court heave vs Gonzaga. Only one counted
text:
An Elite Eight game between Xavier and Gonzaga is getting weird already.
The end of the first half between Gonzaga and Xavier was bonkers. Two amazing plays, only one of which counted.
First: Xavier scores a bucket when Gonzaga’s Johnathan Williams fails to corral a rebound which bounces off of his face into the basket. Have you ever seen this before?
After a Gonzaga bucket, Xavier’s J.P. Macura fired a 3 ⁄ 4 court shot and drained it at the buzzer. Unfortunately, it was just a hair late:
Weird things happen when there’s a Final Four berth on the line.
